„Åæ„Åü„ÄÅÊâãÂãï„Åß„ÅÆ„ÉÜ„Çπ„ÉàÁî®„Å´„ÇØ„É™„Éº„É≥„Å™„ÉÜ„Çπ„Éà„Éë„ÉÉ„Ç±„Éº„Ç∏„Çí‰ΩúÊàê„Åô„Çã„Åì„Å®„ÇÇ„Åß„Åç„Åæ„ÅôÔºö

---

```diff
- 
+ #!/usr/bin/env python3
+ # -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
+ """
+ lilToon PCSS Extension v1.4.9 Unity Test Package Creator
+ Unity„Éó„É≠„Ç∏„Çß„ÇØ„Éà„ÅßÁõ¥Êé•„ÉÜ„Çπ„Éà„Åß„Åç„Çã„ÇØ„É™„Éº„É≥„Å™„Éë„ÉÉ„Ç±„Éº„Ç∏„Çí‰ΩúÊàê
+ """
+ 
+ import os
+ import sys
+ import shutil
+ import json
+ import zipfile
+ import hashlib
+ from pathlib import Path
+ import tempfile
+ 
+ def remove_bom(file_path):
+     """UTF-8 BOM„ÇíÂâäÈô§"""
+     try:
+         with open(file_path, 'rb') as f:
+             content = f.read()
+         
+         if content.startswith(b'\xef\xbb\xbf'):
+             with open(file_path, 'wb') as f:
+                 f.write(content[3:])
+             print(f"‚úÖ Fixed UTF-8 BOM: {os.path.basename(file_path)}")
+     except Exception as e:
+         print(f"‚ùå BOM removal failed for {file_path}: {e}")
+ 
+ def create_unity_test_package():
+     """UnityÁõ¥Êé•„ÉÜ„Çπ„ÉàÁî®„Éë„ÉÉ„Ç±„Éº„Ç∏„Çí‰ΩúÊàê"""
+     print("üöÄ Creating Unity Test Package v1.4.9...")
+     
+     current_dir = Path.cwd()
+     print(f"üìÅ Working directory: {current_dir}")
+     
+     # ÂøÖË¶Å„Å™„Éï„Ç°„Ç§„É´/„Éï„Ç©„É´„ÉÄ„ÅÆ„É™„Çπ„Éà
+     required_items = [
+         "package.json",
+         "README.md", 
+         "CHANGELOG.md",
+         "Editor",
+         "Runtime", 
+         "Shaders"
+     ]
+     
+     # Â≠òÂú®Á¢∫Ë™ç
+     missing_items = []
+     for item in required_items:
+         if not Path(item).exists():
+             missing_items.append(item)
+     
+     if missing_items:
+         print(f"‚ùå Missing required items: {missing_items}")
+         return False
+     
+     # „ÉÜ„É≥„Éù„É©„É™„Éá„Ç£„É¨„ÇØ„Éà„É™„Åß‰ΩúÊ•≠
+     with tempfile.TemporaryDirectory() as temp_dir:
+         print(f"üîß Temp directory: {temp_dir}")
+         
+         # „Éë„ÉÉ„Ç±„Éº„Ç∏„Éá„Ç£„É¨„ÇØ„Éà„É™‰ΩúÊàê
+         package_name = "com.liltoon.pcss-extension-1.4.9-unity-test"
+         package_dir = Path(temp_dir) / package_name
+         package_dir.mkdir()
+         
+         # „Éï„Ç°„Ç§„É´„Ç≥„Éî„Éº
+         files_to_copy = [
+             "package.json",
+             "README.md",
+             "CHANGELOG.md"
+         ]
+         
+         for file_name in files_to_copy:
+             src = Path(file_name)
+             dst = package_dir / file_name
+             if src.exists():
+                 shutil.copy2(src, dst)
+                 remove_bom(dst)
+                 print(f"üìÑ Copied file: {file_name}")
+         
+         # „Éá„Ç£„É¨„ÇØ„Éà„É™„Ç≥„Éî„Éº
+         dirs_to_copy = ["Editor", "Runtime", "Shaders"]
+         
+         for dir_name in dirs_to_copy:
+             src_dir = Path(dir_name)
+             dst_dir = package_dir / dir_name
+             if src_dir.exists():
+                 shutil.copytree(src_dir, dst_dir)
+                 print(f"üìÅ Copied directory: {dir_name}")
+                 
+                 # .cs„Éï„Ç°„Ç§„É´„ÅÆBOMÂâäÈô§
+                 for cs_file in dst_dir.rglob("*.cs"):
+                     remove_bom(cs_file)
+         
+         # package.json„ÇíÊõ¥Êñ∞
+         package_json_path = package_dir / "package.json"
+         try:
+             with open(package_json_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
+                 package_data = json.load(f)
+             
+             # Unity TestÁî®Ë®≠ÂÆö
+             package_data.update({
+                 "name": "com.liltoon.pcss-extension",
+                 "displayName": "lilToon PCSS Extension - Unity Test",
+                 "version": "1.4.9",
+                 "description": "Unity Test Version - Revolutionary Unity Menu Avatar Selector & Complete Shader Error Resolution Edition",
+                 "unity": "2022.3",
+                 "unityRelease": "22f1"
+             })
+             
+             with open(package_json_path, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
+                 json.dump(package_data, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False)
+             
+             print("‚úÖ Updated package.json for Unity Test")
+             
+         except Exception as e:
+             print(f"‚ùå Failed to update package.json: {e}")
+             return False
+         
+         # ZIP„Éï„Ç°„Ç§„É´‰ΩúÊàê
+         zip_name = f"{package_name}.zip"
+         zip_path = current_dir / zip_name
+         
+         with zipfile.ZipFile(zip_path, 'w', zipfile.ZIP_DEFLATED) as zipf:
+             for file_path in package_dir.rglob('*'):
+                 if file_path.is_file():
+                     arc_name = file_path.relative_to(package_dir.parent)
+                     zipf.write(file_path, arc_name)
+         
+         # „Éï„Ç°„Ç§„É´„Çµ„Ç§„Ç∫„Å®„Éè„ÉÉ„Ç∑„É•Ë®àÁÆó
+         file_size = zip_path.stat().st_size
+         
+         with open(zip_path, 'rb') as f:
+             sha256_hash = hashlib.sha256(f.read()).hexdigest().upper()
+         
+         print(f"\nüéâ Unity Test Package Created Successfully!")
+         print(f"üì¶ Package: {zip_name}")
+         print(f"üìè Size: {file_size:,} bytes ({file_size/1024:.1f} KB)")
+         print(f"üîê SHA256: {sha256_hash}")
+         
+         # „Éë„ÉÉ„Ç±„Éº„Ç∏ÊßãÈÄ†Ë°®Á§∫
+         print(f"\nüìã Package Structure:")
+         print(f"{package_name}/")
+         for item in sorted(package_dir.rglob('*')):
+             if item.is_file():
+                 rel_path = item.relative_to(package_dir)
+                 indent = "  " * (len(rel_path.parts) - 1)
+                 print(f"{indent}{rel_path.name}")
+             elif item != package_dir:
+                 rel_path = item.relative_to(package_dir)
+                 indent = "  " * (len(rel_path.parts) - 1)
+                 print(f"{indent}{rel_path.name}/")
+         
+         print(f"\nüìù Unity „Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Éà„Éº„É´ÊâãÈ†Ü:")
+         print(f"1. Unity Editor„ÇíÈñâ„Åò„Çã")
+         print(f"2. {zip_name} „ÇíÂ±ïÈñã")
+         print(f"3. {package_name} „Éï„Ç©„É´„ÉÄ„Çí Packages/ „Å´„Ç≥„Éî„Éº")
+         print(f"4. Unity Editor„ÇíÈñã„Åè")
+         print(f"5. Package Manager„ÅßÁ¢∫Ë™ç")
+         
+         print(f"\nüöÄ Unity Test Package creation completed successfully!")
+         return True
+ 
+ if __name__ == "__main__":
+     try:
+         success = create_unity_test_package()
+         if success:
+             print("\n‚úÖ All operations completed successfully!")
+         else:
+             print("\n‚ùå Some operations failed!")
+             sys.exit(1)
+     except Exception as e:
+         print(f"\nüí• Unexpected error: {e}")
+         sys.exit(1) 
```
